title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A person may challenge your expertise today, possibly throwing you off course. You might feel the need to share all of your research to assert your authority, yet this isnt a wise use of your time. Uncover the motives behind this resistance to your efforts. Someone is either digging for information or too careless with their own opinions to be informed. But also consider why you are quick to retort so passionately now. Youre seeking validation and value for your knowledge, but you must focus on interacting in a sincere exchange with the right people. Time spent in true community is never wasted. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
